securityTips.title: Account Security Tips
securityTips.strongPassword: Use a strong, unique password that combines letters, numbers, and special characters.
securityTips.changeRegularly: Change your password regularly for enhanced security.
securityTips.neverShare: Never share your password with anyone, including support staff.
securityTips.phishing: Be cautious of phishing attempts requesting your login credentials.
securityTips.signOut: Sign out from your account when using shared or public computers.
